discourse_list.title: Update to EIP-150: Add information about previous gas costs

content.content: This is a proposed update to EIP-150 by @chfast. “Because Yellow Paper only describes the latest mainnet hard fork, there is not official source of information were the gas costs before the changes of EIP-150 are provided.” The pull request: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/1140/commits/2ef0a3f09ffce3ba9b7cfec2d2f20f0001ec6011#diff-9906fa711a4da77e30a336f7692f8ce8 The discussion: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/1140
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposed update to EIP-150 by @chfast, which aims to add information about previous gas costs. The post provides a link to the pull request and the discussion on GitHub. The post does not contain any advertising or collaboration requests.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
